Judul: ���Why Save the  World When You  can Design It?��� * Precarity and  Fashion in Milan
Abstrak:
This  paper  considers  precarity  and  the  fashion  industry,  focusing  on  
Serpica  Naro:  a  fictitious  designer  invented  by  a  Milan-based  fashion  
collective  involved  in  social  research  on  intellectual  property,  subjec-
tivity  in  the  creative  industries,  and  precarious  forms  of  labor  in  the  
fashion system.
Kata Kunci: precarity, fashion activism, metabrand, Milan, Serpica
Sumber: Fashion Theory: The Journal of Dress, Body & Culture. Sep2016, Vol. 20 Issue 4, p441-460. 20p
